A fun simple concept that I find a seriously harmed by the incredibly long grind and p2w content.  I'm of course talking about the perk system.  When I first got this game I only played in customs which lets you use all the perks and add ons.  It was a lot of fun experimenting with different builds.

The actual game is nothing like this though, you will spend most of your time grinding for perks that are pointlessly locked behind characters you probably don't want to play.  None of Leatherfaces perks are good on leatherface but they're really good on other killers so you have to waste your bloodpoints on a character you don't even want to play.

That gets me into the p2w content.  Every red rank survivor uses Decisive Strike and every red rank killer uses Hex: Ruin.  These are both locked behind characters you have to buy.  Laurie Strode has decisive and she costs $5 real money to buy.  The hag has ruin and she also costs either $5 or 100 hours of grinding for the in game currency.  It's absurd.  Both of these perks extend the game quite a bit which is pretty damn important when playing killer is about wasting as little time as possible.

Then there's the add ons.  These allow the Killer to take absurd consumable buffs, for example normally the huntress can down you with 2 hatchets, but by consuming an add on she only needs one.  If killers take ultra rare addons they basically get a free win.  If survivors take ultra rare addons they also basically get a free win.  If killer takes an ebony mori he gets a free win.  It's really stupid, to load into a game, lose horribly and realize you pretty much had no chance and wasted 15 minutes of your life because your enemy decided to use overpowered consumables.

TL:DR, good core game, ruined by a bunch of dumb shit the developers added to encourage you to mindlessly grind.

Dunque, partire a descrivere le ragioni per le quali un individuo dovrebbe spendere il suo tempo a giocare a Dead By Daylight, non è semplice, perché Dead By Daylight o lo odi o lo adori, oppure lo odi e lo adori entrambi nello stesso istante. L'idea del gioco, seppur semplice e non del tutto completamente originale, regge bene e nonostante vi siano ancora dopo 4 anni evidenti problemi tecnici e di bilanciamento, le ore di divertimento sono comunque assicurate. Se non si tiene conto di alcuni aspetti antipatici, come le attese in lobby piuttosto lunghine per trovare un match (che possono variare da 1 a 10 minuti), mappe non esattamente ben studiate, l'aspetto visivo che non riesci a comprendere se ti fa schifo o ti piace, senza contare una certa tossicità della community dei giocatori che ne fanno parte, Dead By Daylight provoca comunque una certa dipendenza e voglia di spenderci parecchio tempo sopra. Cosa sia esattamente quell'ingrediente segreto che lo ponga nei preferiti di molte librerie Steam, difficile a dirsi. Sarà il sistema di perk? Il concetto di looping? La soddisfazione che provoca vincere una partita? Nessuno lo sa con esattezza, sta di fatto che Dead By Daylight riesce a stare in piedi e a "funzionare" in modo considerevole. La prima volta che l'ho aperto ho detto "Ma che è sto schifo?", poi una volta iniziato a giocarlo, non ho più chiuso il gioco. Io ne consiglio l'acquisto e il supporto nel modo più assoluto, ma siate pazienti, è tutt'altro che perfetto... e forse forse, è proprio questo che lo rende divertente.

Wenn "Hassliebe" einen Gametitel hat, dann Dead by Daylight. So viele Fehler es manchmal hat, gerade Lobbytechnisch, so aufregend ist es doch immer wieder, wenn man es mal ein paar Monate nicht gespielt hat. Ich spiele es nach wie vor unfassbar gern und der Adrenalinpegel steigt heute noch, trotz fast 600 Spielstunden,

Question? why dont you have a actually customer support area? so i tried to make a ticket and then got kicked from that ("Nice"). you made the game shittier with this new way of just killer focus. i guess you just want people to be shit or troll in games with survivors? if you are going to say no then why is there a timer? and no an option to find the bloody hatch? i dont understand you guys? were the killers bitching about not winning? i just dont understand. as the game is now, if you a survivor, then you might as well troll. at least you would get more value from that since its almost impossible to win now (legit). this makes me wish i could get a refund. because now i dont want to play this game anymore. or only play killer, since i know i have a higher chance of winner (in general)!!! makes sence since almost every game ive play since i came back have been loses!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! if you do allow refunds, yes please, because i think im done with this game if this is the way you people are going to run this game now.

Эта игра, ни есть что иное, как пустая трата времени, ладно если бы только времени, так она ещё и убивает в моральном плане, очень не рекомендую данный продукт. К тому же, меня ещё банили на старых аккаунтах из-за одной ачивки на hag (хагу, т.е. ведьму), которую я не хотел брать сам, т.к. когда она только выходила скорость постановки её трап была наверное дольше чем заводка пилы у HillBilly (билли, т.е. деревенщину) с 2-мя гравюрами.

一款十分有趣的1v4非对称，我个人是不太感冒pvp类型的游戏，关注这个游戏应该也有四年了，因为当初配置跟不上，玩个腾讯全家桶都费劲，只能在各类视频软件云游玩，直到18年年初换了电脑，入了steam当时想都没想直接就入了杀鸡，这也是我steam第一款游戏，我也是因为这款游戏认识了更多的朋友，好了，不扯闲话直入主题，黎明杀机没有输赢，很多人以为跑出去或者傻满四个人才算正真的游戏胜利，其实这个纯属误区，黎明杀机的段位制完全是看你的比赛各类分数来升段的，一些自私鬼为了自己跑出去不救人不修机，进游戏躲柜子，然而就算是这样跑出去了，由于分数低下根本上不了段反而还会掉段，反之只要积极配合队友，赚取足够的团队分，哪怕最后没有跑出去，也有足够的分上段，这是一款团队游戏，自私鬼也就只有在20段徘徊的份，但是这样的人其实也是少之又少，我遇到的大多数人都是以死相救，这也是我热爱这款游戏的一个原因吧，emm算算大小号也玩了300多小时了，虽然玩的也不算久，但是这款游戏真的非常值得推荐给身边的朋友，车队欢乐多hh，祝各位生活愉快XD

My friend told me about this game and I was skeptical at first. A game trying to recreate my favorite horror movies and scenes? I just didn't know. I bought it anyway and have sunk my life into it. It's a great tense game and really beats the grind. I do have some cons; the graphics aren't all that great, but a game is more than its fidelity and some of its parts. 10 out of 10 
would recommend it.
